title: Interpretation of a dream about buying new shoes for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about buying new shoes for a married woman: Ibn Sirin believes that a dream about buying new shoes for a married woman is an indicator. She stated that she has a desire to end her marriage and marry another man soon. If she sees in a dream that she is getting shoes from a man other than her husband, this indicates her divorce and marriage to Another man. But if a married woman sees in a dream that her husband is offering her new shoes, the dream is considered a strong indication of her new pregnancy very soon. This dream shows the stability and comfort that the couple feels with each other. If a married woman sees old shoes in a dream. It is Evidence of the appearance of people from the past in a woman’s life. This is an unpleasant dream, as it indicates that some problems will arise between her and her husband due to the appearance of these people in her life. For a married woman, she dreams of wearing black shoes. This dream indicates that he will find a new job and have many relationships. Successful. And if he sees gold shoes, this indicates that he will obtain a promotion and a great position or a great inheritance. See also: Interpretation of dreams about buying black shoes. Interpretation of a dream about buying new shoes for a single girl. As we mentioned, the single dream differs in its interpretation for a married woman, and likewise for a single girl. The interpretation of a dream about buying new shoes for a single girl is as follows: If an unmarried girl dreams of buying new shoes. It shows that this girl will fulfill a wish that she has dreamed of for a long time. Dreaming about shoes generally symbolizes your journey towards your goals and destiny, but the actual meaning depends on the details surrounding your dream , such as the color and type of shoes and what you did with them. And if a girl dreams of seeing someone giving her shoes. It shows that you will soon get some help that will move you forward in life and this help is related to your education, work, business, or money in general. If a girl dreams that she loses Her shoes. It shows that you feel upset and have no foundation for your life and do not know what to do or where to start. This is the place where you should try to take a break and take a comprehensive look at your life so that you can know exactly where you want to start from. As for The psychological meaning of losing a shoe for an unmarried girl. A shoe represents your ability to move forward in your spiritual life. This dream in which you lose your shoe means spiritually that your spirituality will not advance due to life’s problems. You may find yourself focusing excessively on money while ignoring your spiritual growth. Interpretation of a dream about buying new shoes for a man: A man’s dream about buying new shoes in a dream is considered a dream. He will achieve a series of successes in his current life, whether in terms of the success of projects, projects, etc. A dream about buying shoes may mean that you have the wrong goals in mind and that you need to set a new destination. You may not be well equipped for the current goal and you may end up wasting time because new shoes represent a new path you are taking in your life. A dream in which you see yourself wearing two different shoes in one dream means that you are hesitant about where you want to go.

title: Interpretation of seeing pastries in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing pastries in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi, pastries are delicious meals that everyone loves to eat, but their preparation requires some effort and fatigue. If they also appear in a dream, in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing pastries in a dream according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi. Interpretation of a dream of seeing pastries in a dream for a single woman Interpretation by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that pastries and pies in a dream symbolize a halal diet and abundance of money. It appears He will find a suitable job that will make her happy, and he will be promoted to the highest positions and earn a lot of money. Seeing the rise and growth of the dough indicates that his condition is good and all his conditions have changed for the better. Cutting the dough into small pieces indicates his wisdom in life, especially in spending money and not doing it except when necessary. Interpretation of a dream about buying baked goods in a dream for a single woman. We mention below the interpretation of baked goods in a dream for a single woman and that they buy them: It indicates the preparations that you are making for the wedding. Buying pastries stuffed with meat symbolizes earning money without getting tired, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing yourself making pies in a dream is in the following paragraph. We explain to you the interpretation of a single woman who sees herself kneading pancakes and making them in a dream: Making pancakes with white flour symbolizes one’s kindness and willingness to do good. Making and cutting pancakes indicates that she is looking for something related to her future and that she will make the right decision that will change her life for the better. Interpretation of the dream of seeing pancakes In a dream, interpretation of Al-Osaimi: Well-fermented dough in the oven symbolizes the date of her approaching engagement and marriage. It appears that her wishes will come true soon. As for the dough, which is not soft, but rather hard, it appears that she has a strong personality and a wise mind that helps her manage things rationally. Eating raw pies before For a single woman to fully mature and settle down indicates her impulsive nature and her haste in making important decisions in her life. While she was eating the dough, which was sweet, it symbolized that she heard good news about her life and future, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about eating pies with cheese for unmarried women Below is an interpretation for a woman A single woman eats pies stuffed with cheese in a dream: Pies in a single woman’s dream represent her relationship with men. If she ate pies stuffed with cheese, this dream indicates tension in her relationship with her fiancé, and she entered into arguments and problems, but they will end quickly and their marriage will be completed, by God’s will. Eating sugar pies indicates a happy engagement for a well-to-do young man who loves and appreciates her. According to what interpretation scholars have mentioned in their interpretation books, there are interpretations. Many psychological and life meanings can be deduced from the dream of eating pastries and the details that occurred in the dream, such as the type of pies and filling. Whether the god ate or not is an important detail in interpretation.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a lamp in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Gathering in a dream In the world of dream interpretation, the lamp carries a group of good meanings that cause joy and stability for the sleeper in reality, in addition to the use of the rosary and mentioning God often in the vision proves the extent of closeness to God and the fear of committing sins to be lost or cut off. We present the most important interpretations of the dream. During our article.Gathering in a dream, the interpretation of a dream about a lamp confirms the great things that a person succeeds in acquiring, and this makes him live a smooth and peaceful life. Interpretation scholars confirm that seeing beads is a good omen for whoever sees them, and Imam Al-Sadiq says that there are many reasons for goodness that the sleeper will attain while viewing them, especially if You saw colored beads, this indicates for him the provision of children and legitimate money. The lamp in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of the dream of the lamp by Ibn Sirin emphasizes the dreamer’s righteous children and the abundance of God’s kindness to him in his descendants. However, if the person is not married, God Almighty will give him a beautiful girl who is close to everyone. Thanks to her bright and good morals. If a married woman finds a rosary in her dream, Ibn Sirin explains that she is a great lady and has a praiseworthy character, and therefore the husband appreciates and loves her very much. Enter the online Dream Interpretation website from Google and search for all the interpretations you are looking for. Gathering in a dream For a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees herself using beads in her vision and pleading with God - Glory be to Him - in her dream, and these beads are blue, then the dream will be interpreted as a practical promotion, an increase in one’s status, and the fulfillment of great big dreams in her future. As for white beads, they symbolize innocence. She is strong in her good qualities and morals, but if she sees the black beads and her fiancé gives them to her, then he is very religious and always thinks about that before him, and from here on she will live with great happiness, God willing. The lamp in a married woman’s dreamIt is considered one of the greatest things to see the same woman in a dream glorifying and using the rosary. Dream scholars explain to us the extreme weakness that she will enjoy in her reality if she is sad due to lack of money. In addition, the praise itself shows affection for her marital relationship and the approaching pregnancy if it is planned, God willing. The black rosary in the dream confirms the great generosity that her husband receives from work, and from here her life is stable with him, with the exception of the green rosary, which shows the utmost luxury and luxury in reality. The lamp in A pregnant woman’s dream: When a pregnant woman sees the rosary in her sight, the meaning heralds her many worries that will go away and the pain that will leave her body, in addition to the good meanings that confirm her birth and the strong health of the fetus. Interpretation scholars say that seeing the rosary in a dream indicates pregnancy for the girl, While the act of glorifying and repeatedly remembering God could be a symbol of the birth of a boy. A blessing in a dream for a divorced woman. It can be said: Seeing the rosary in a divorced woman’s dream is a good thing. If she finds white beads, this indicates that she is thinking about getting married again.

title: Interpretation of seeing the minaret of the Grand Mosque in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing the minaret of the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream or dream goes beyond the vision website roy2a.com. The Grand Mosque in Mecca is one of the holy places where Muslims travel from all over the world to pray, and seeing the Grand Mosque or its minaret in a dream can convey good news to the dreamer, as they are things Evokes feelings. As for its interpretation, it has many meanings. Interpreters differed in interpreting the Sacred Mosque in a dream according to the dreamer’s condition and circumstances and whether he is a single man or woman, married or pregnant. Interpretation of seeing the minaret of the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of great interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing the minaret of the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream according to Ibn Sirin: Seeing the minaret of the Grand Mosque in a dream indicates what the dreamer is doing For the sake of good deeds and reconciliation among people. Seeing the minaret of the Sacred Mosque in a dream means calling to the truth, following guidance, forbidding evil, and following falsehood. Seeing the Sacred Mosque in Mecca in a dream means getting rid of problems, eliminating sorrows, and releasing worries. Seeing the Sacred Mosque in Mecca in a dream may indicate To the dreamer performing Hajj or Umrah in the near future. See also: Interpretation of seeing Umrah in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the minaret of the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Seeing the minaret of the Grand Mosque in a dream means the guardian, ruler, or any person responsible for the conditions of Muslims. Seeing the minaret falling in a dream Or its demolition, indicating the death of the muezzin or the outbreak of rebellion among the people of this country. What is the interpretation of seeing the minaret of the Sacred Mosque in a dream for a man: Seeing the minaret of the Sacred Mosque in a dream indicates righteousness, piety, closeness to God Almighty, and his distance from heresies and misguidance. Seeing someone lighting the minaret of the Sacred Mosque in Mecca. In a dream, it indicates the country’s renaissance, progress, and prosperity. However, seeing a closed minaret indicates the opposite. Seeing a person carrying a copper, gold, or silver minaret in a dream indicates an unjust ruler who oppresses the people and does not restore justice. A person seeing that the minaret is made of wood in The dream refers to a responsible person who leaves power or is removed from his position. See also: Interpretation of seeing the veil in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the minaret of the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman in the minaret of the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream. This indicates that she will soon marry a good person. And piety and goodness. Seeing an unmarried woman in the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream denotes the good conduct of the pioneer and people’s love for her. Seeing an unmarried woman in the Sacred Mosque in Mecca in a dream denotes a wish or desire that will be fulfilled in the near future. Seeing a single minaret in a dream, according to some interpreters, is A reference to the dreamer’s mother. See also: Interpretation of seeing circumambulation around the Holy Kaaba in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the minaret of the Grand Mosque in Mecca in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman in the Grand Mosque in a dream indicates solving problems and ending disputes.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of the dream of flying without wings, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about flying without wings: Can a man fly without wings? If it is a dream, then anything is possible. Scientists and leading interpreters have given us hundreds of different interpretations of seeing flying without wings in a dream, whether in a man’s dream or a woman’s dream in general. If you are interested in searching for an interpretation of this dream and knowing its implications, you can check out this article. Interpretation of a dream about flying without wingsThe interpretation of a dream about flying without wings for a single woman and feeling afraid of falling can warn her that she will be involved in the problems that plague her life. It can symbolize A dream about flying without a wing indicates unpleasant qualities for the dreamer, such as haste and recklessness. But if the dreamer sees that he flies in his dream without a wing until the end and arrives in peace and goodness, then this is a sign of concealment from God in his wealth and body. Interpretation of a dream about flying without wings by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned in his interpretation The dream of flying without wings is as follows: Ibn Sirin says: Whoever dreams that he is flying without wings is very pious. If the dreamer is sick and sees in his dream that he is flying in the sky without wings, this may mean his death is approaching. I dreamed that I was flying without wings, but I did not fall. , which indicates the fulfillment of an impossible desire. Interpretation of a dream about flight without wings for a girl: Interpretation of a dream about a young girl flying without wings and piercing the clouds may indicate her short life. If a girl sees that she is flying without a wing in a dream and reaching space, this is good news about the fulfillment of her simple aspirations in the future. Without misery. Interpretation of a dream about flying without wings for individuals: Seeing an unmarried woman flying in a dream without a wing and suddenly landing may indicate that she is living in illusions and being deceived by others. Interpretation of a working girl’s dream of flying without wings indicates her hard work and struggle to overcome the difficulties of excellence and reaching the forefront. Aviation Without wings in a woman’s dream is evidence of psychological peace within her provided that she does not fall. Ibn Sirin claims that flying without wings in a woman’s dream over a green orchard indicates her good qualities and high morals, as she is distinguished by her good conduct among people. Interpretation of a dream about flying without wings for a married womanIf a woman sees For a married woman to fly in the sky without a wing and fall, she may become seriously ill. For a wife to see in her dream one of her children flying in the sky without wings and being happy, carrying promising signs such as his success in studies and his excellence or his marriage to the one he loves if he is young. The interpretation of a dream about flying without Wings for a married woman with her husband. Flying at a high altitude and feeling safe with him shows her husband’s appreciation for her and her high status with him. Interpretation of a dream about flying without a wing for a pregnant woman. Flying in the sky without a wing for a pregnant woman and feeling fear can portend negative events during pregnancy. If a pregnant woman sees that she is flying without Wings in a dream, but smoothly and empowering, this is news that will facilitate childbirth and get rid of pregnancy problems. But if she sees that she is flying without a wing and falling and she is in the first months, then she may suffer a miscarriage and lose the fetus. Al-Asim says

Interpretation of a dream about flight without wings for a girl: Interpretation of a dream about a young girl flying without wings and piercing the clouds may indicate her short life. If a girl sees that she is flying without a wing in a dream and reaching space, this is good news about the fulfillment of her simple aspirations in the future. Without misery. Interpretation of a dream about flying without wings for individuals: Seeing an unmarried woman flying in a dream without a wing and suddenly landing may indicate that she is living in illusions and being deceived by others. Interpretation of a working girl’s dream of flying without wings indicates her hard work and struggle to overcome the difficulties of excellence and reaching the forefront. Aviation Without wings in a woman’s dream is evidence of psychological peace within her provided that she does not fall. Ibn Sirin claims that flying without wings in a woman’s dream over a green orchard indicates her good qualities and high morals, as she is distinguished by her good conduct among people. Interpretation of a dream about flying without wings for a married womanIf a woman sees For a married woman to fly in the sky without a wing and fall, she may become seriously ill. For a wife to see in her dream one of her children flying in the sky without wings and being happy, carrying promising signs such as his success in studies and his excellence or his marriage to the one he loves if he is young. The interpretation of a dream about flying without Wings for a married woman with her husband. Flying at a high altitude and feeling safe with him shows her husband’s appreciation for her and her high status with him. Interpretation of a dream about flying without a wing for a pregnant woman. Flying in the sky without a wing for a pregnant woman and feeling fear can portend negative events during pregnancy. If a pregnant woman sees that she is flying without Wings in a dream, but smoothly and empowering, this is news that will facilitate childbirth and get rid of pregnancy problems. But if she sees that she is flying without a wing and falling and she is in the first months, then she may suffer a miscarriage and lose the fetus. Al-Asim says

title: Interpretation of a dream about an electric plug and a symbol of electricity in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an electric socket by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of dreams: An electric socket in a dream. Being electrocuted without being harmed is evidence of your closeness to God Almighty and the good work that the monarch has done. If a person sees in his dream that he inserted an electrical socket and was electrocuted without any of the people interfering, this indicates Asceticism and abundant nutrition that the dreamer has acquired. As for seeing someone in a dream being electrocuted, this is evidence that this dreamer needs help. A dream about an electrical outlet by Al-Nabulsi• For a person to see in a dream that he has been electrocuted because of a woman, this indicates goodness, especially if she This woman is beautiful, but if she is not beautiful and is characterized by ugliness, this indicates the presence of obstacles and problems to which he is exposed.• If a person dreams that he himself is electrocuted, then this indicates repentance and a return to God Almighty. The symbol of electricity in a dream in detail. If anyone sees the dream of being electrocuted Someone electrocuted, this symbolizes the deception and machinations to which the fortuneteller is exposed by that person. Seeing an unknown person shocking the dreamer in a dream is a symbol of the problems the dreamer faces. As for seeing the desire to set some people on fire, this is a symbol of taking revenge on some people. Interpretation A dream about an electrical plug for a man. A dream about an electrical diamond in a dream is evidence of bad words that the viewer hears. An electric shock in a man’s dream is an unpleasant vision. Connecting electricity in a dream and Islam without a cover indicates temptations and problems to which the dreamer is exposed. Seeing a dream about one electrical plug. Seeing the only girl who She places a power plug and an electric shock in a dream is evidence that she will discover the truth about a friend who is conspiring against her. title: What are the important interpretations of seeing a butcher in a dream?

preview.html: Seeing a butcher in a dream and its interpretation. The butcher is the person responsible for slaughtering and cutting up animals and selling them to consumers. His presence is very important in a person’s life, and seeing him in a dream shows many interpretations, but these interpretations depend on the condition of the butcher and his body, and the dreamer’s condition when he sees a dream and sees the butcher and blood filling his clothes, this indicates The upcoming death of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a butcher: Seeing a butcher slaughtering livestock foretells to the dreamer that his health will improve significantly, if he is sick, and his body will recover. Seeing large amounts of blood in the aftermath of the massacre indicates that the dreamer will go through a period of conflict and many enmities will arise between him and others. If the dreamer has many debts and sees this dream, then this dream heralds him the imminent payment of this debt. If the dreamer is imprisoned or captured, then this dream indicates that his captivity will soon be released, and sometimes this dream can lead to difficult steps. For the pioneer or his inability to achieve his goals or failure to make the right decisions. Cutting meat in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is drowning many people, and this dream is a warning to stop this habit. If the dreamer sees that the butcher is slaughtering, then this dream promises the dreamer that he will be able to achieve His dreams and that he will live in a state of happiness and joy. If the butcher slaughters animals that are not allowed to be eaten, then this dream suggests that the dreamer will suffer from injustice in many ways. If the Virgin sees the butcher in her dream, this warns her of her association with the wrong person, and if she sees one of her relatives He slaughters, it means that God will send her many good things. When a married woman sees a butcher in her dream, this means that she will go through some problems, but she will be able to overcome them easily. If her husband is facing some problems, then this dream promises her that she will be able to solve them, If he is sick, this is evidence that he will recover soon. When a pregnant woman sees a butcher in her dream, this foretells that she will give birth soon and that she and her child will be in good health. Interpretation of a dream about buying meat from a butcher in a dream When a married woman dreams that she will buy meat from a butcher, this dream He promises her that she will become pregnant soon. Google the Egyptian dream interpretation website and you will find all the dream interpretations you are looking for. Interpretation of the butcher in dreams If the dreamer buys meat and eats it as it is, this indicates that he will fall into many disagreements with those close to him and is evidence of the difficulty of overcoming the consequences in his life. If The dreamer was happy to eat meat, then this dream warns the dreamer not to take money. Because they all come from forbidden sources. When a young man goes to get meat, this indicates that he will associate with a good girl and will live with her happily and with peace of mind. If the dreamer takes the intention meat and cuts it into small cubes, then this dream indicates that he will be able to overcome any crisis In his life and the difficult period he spent in his life will end. What does seeing a butcher and meat in a dream indicate to Ibn Sirin? Interpretation of a dream about a butcher by Ibn Sirin and from the imams of Islamic scholars

title: What is the interpretation of seeing the full moon in a dream and what is the meaning of the splitting of the moon?

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing the moon in a dream is complete, because the moon is a luminous object that reflects sunlight to illuminate the world in the dark. We have collected for you, my dears, all the facts and interpretations related to seeing more than one full moon in a dream and what the moonlight symbolizes in the dream. The dream is evidence that the dreamer will overcome difficult stages in his life. Seeing more than one moon in a dream is full of desirable visions and indicates goodness and long life. Interpretation of the full moon in a dream for a common woman. Seeing the full moon in a dream for an ordinary woman means that she will soon marry a well-born person. And God knows best. The moon in a girl’s dream shows her the arrival of kindness and nourishment in her afterlife. The moon in a woman’s dream is a vessel of visions that indicate achieving goals and ambitions and striving for success. Also, seeing the moon for an ordinary woman indicates a happy life free of problems and obstacles. To see A woman is represented in her dream by a small moon, which indicates tension, sadness, and anguish, God forbid. As for a girl who sees a lunar eclipse in her dream, it is one of the unpleasant visions that indicate misfortunes, disasters, and diseases, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of a full moon in a dream for a married woman. Moonlight in a woman’s dream. For a married woman, it indicates marital happiness, psychological comfort, and family stability. The moon in a married woman’s dream is one of the good dreams that indicate a lot of goodness and abundance for her and her husband, and God knows best. Also, the presence of a small moon in her dream may be the result of marital problems and arguments, and God knows best. A lunar eclipse is evidence of... Pain and tension, and it could be a problem that leads to the wife’s divorce, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of the full moon in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing the moon in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the strength of the male child, and God knows what is in the wombs. The moon in a pregnant woman’s dream is a harbinger of a male child who has a famous and well-known status. Among people, and God knows best. Also, a lunar eclipse for a pregnant woman is an unpleasant vision that does not bode well for her, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the moon in a full dream for a man. The moon in an unmarried young man’s dream indicates his marriage to a beautiful girl, and God knows best. The moon appears to the man in his dream. That he is rich, righteous, and happy in his next life. Likewise, a lunar eclipse in a person’s dream is one of the unpleasant visions that portends calamities and misfortunes, and God is the Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing yourself stepping on the moon in a dream: Seeing someone in a dream come true as he ascends to the surface of the moon means that He will reach the highest positions in his work. Also, seeing a dream of climbing the full moon is one of the dreams that indicates the marriage of unmarried young people. Also, seeing a pregnant woman climbing the moon in her dream is good for her, and seeing a child will have an important role in society. Interpretation of seeing the moon Burning in a dream: One of the unpleasant dreams is to see the full moon burning in a dream, because it indicates great misfortunes and disasters. This also means

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a cinema in a dream for a man

preview.html: Seeing a cinema in a dream for a man: Seeing a cinema in a dream is a sign of optimism and this is a sign of marriage to a person and symbolizes ambition. Seeing the entrance to a cinema indicates a desire to change reality. The interpretation of a dream about a cinema in a dream, according to great Arab translators and leading scholars, will explain in this article, in detail and in detail, the meaning of dreaming about seeing a cinema in a dream for a cinema man. They are big screen shows. This movie plays roles and film festivals in a dream are evidence of alienation and distance from parents. Seeing a director indicates success in the dreamer's life, whether it is in work or in passion. It refers to many different concepts as we will refer to them today. Interpretation of a dream about cinema by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a cinema in a dream indicates ambition and effort to achieve goals. Seeing the dreamer as if they are going to the cinema with their friend is a sign of love and friendship between them. Seeing a person What is in the cinema in one dream means marriage soon. The sleeper can see himself as a director or actor in one of the great movie roles. Film festivals in a dream are evidence of alienation and distance from parents. Ibn Sirin interpreted it as success, achieving long-term goals and a lot of optimism about life. And in reality. The red carpet in a dream is a big profit and a blessing in money and children. Interpretation of a dream about a movie for a single woman: Seeing unmarried women in a dream as if they are entering the cinema because of their urgent desire to change the reality in which they live. Watching a feature film that shows a change in her life. Watching a movie Dramatic in a dream is evidence of frustration and boredom. Watching a comedy is a witness to her life full of happiness and joy. Watching a movie in a dream for a man is considered a sign of loneliness and depression. Interpretation of a dream about cinema for a married woman: Seeing a married woman going to the cinema in a dream is A sign of happiness and joy. Also, seeing a cinema in a dream for a married woman indicates her stability. Seeing a comic book in a dream for a married woman is a sign of happiness in her life. Seeing a sad movie in a dream indicates sadness and depression in one’s life. Interpretation of a dream about cinema for a woman Pregnant: A pregnant woman watching a short movie in a dream indicates the approaching date of giving birth. Watching a movie in a dream for a man if the movie she sees in a long dream is a sign of the beginning of pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about cinema for a man: A man watching a horror movie in a dream indicates psychological pressure. What the dreamer is experiencing. Watching a comedy or musical movie with a man who seeks to achieve his goals. Interpretation of a dream about a film festival: Seeing a film festival in a dream indicates the dreamer’s journey. Seeing film festivals in a dream indicates success. He sees the red carpet that he walks at festivals as a sign of Profit. The Best Actor Award indicates a high position in the workplace. Interpretation of a dream about acting and directing in cinema: Seeing the dreamer as if he is an actor in the cinema, this indicates his urgent desire for fame and
